channel.title: Pom on A coders, hackers heaven.....Hm...I do not think so...
channel.description: Recent content in Pom on A coders, hackers heaven.....Hm...I do not think so...

item.title: Maven POM Style Guide?
item.description: If you are working over a longer time with Maven your pom´s become larger and in particular in projects it happens that everyone has it´s own belief of how a good pom style should look like. Packaging type before artifactId, groupId and version, modules before any other things or after all other things etc. Sounds familiar? Using a coding style guide in the Java development is usually today no big deal anymore.
